verses.kjv: And when he had opened the seventh seal, there was silence in heaven about the space of half an hour.
verses.ct: When the Lamb opened the 7th seal, heaven fell completely silent for about half an hour.

verses.kjv: And I saw the seven angels which stood before God; and to them were given seven trumpets.
verses.ct: Then I saw the 7 angels who stand in God's presence, and each of them was given a trumpet.

verses.kjv: And another angel came and stood at the altar, having a golden censer; and there was given unto him much incense, that he should offer it with the prayers of all saints upon the golden altar which was before the throne.
verses.ct: Another angel came and stood at the altar, holding a golden incense burner. He was given a large amount of incense to offer along with the prayers of all God's people on the golden altar in front of the throne.

verses.kjv: And the smoke of the incense, which came with the prayers of the saints, ascended up before God out of the angelâ€™s hand.
verses.ct: The smoke of the incense rose up from the angel's hand into God's presence, carrying with it the prayers of God's people.

verses.kjv: And the angel took the censer, and filled it with fire of the altar, and cast it into the earth: and there were voices, and thunderings, and lightnings, and an earthquake.
verses.ct: Then the angel took the incense burner, filled it with fire from the altar, and hurled it down to the earth. Immediately there were rumblings, crashes of thunder, flashes of lightning, and an earthquake.

verses.kjv: And the seven angels which had the seven trumpets prepared themselves to sound.
verses.ct: Then the 7 angels holding the 7 trumpets got ready to blow them.

verses.kjv: The first angel sounded, and there followed hail and fire mingled with blood, and they were cast upon the earth: and the third part of trees was burnt up, and all green grass was burnt up.
verses.ct: The 1st angel blew his trumpet, and hail and fire mixed with blood came raining down on the earth. A 3rd of all the trees burned up, and every blade of green grass burned up.

verses.kjv: And the second angel sounded, and as it were a great mountain burning with fire was cast into the sea: and the third part of the sea became blood;
verses.ct: The 2nd angel blew his trumpet, and something like an enormous mountain engulfed in flames was thrown into the sea. A 3rd of the sea turned to blood,

verses.kjv: And the third part of the creatures which were in the sea, and had life, died; and the third part of the ships were destroyed.
verses.ct: a 3rd of all the living creatures in the sea died, and a 3rd of the ships were destroyed.

verses.kjv: And the third angel sounded, and there fell a great star from heaven, burning as it were a lamp, and it fell upon the third part of the rivers, and upon the fountains of waters;
verses.ct: The 3rd angel blew his trumpet, and a massive star blazing like a torch fell from heaven. It landed on a 3rd of the rivers and on the springs of water.

verses.kjv: And the name of the star is called Wormwood: and the third part of the waters became wormwood; and many men died of the waters, because they were made bitter.
verses.ct: The star's name was Wormwood. A 3rd of all the water turned bitter like wormwood, and many people died from drinking the poisoned water.

verses.kjv: And the fourth angel sounded, and the third part of the sun was smitten, and the third part of the moon, and the third part of the stars; so as the third part of them was darkened, and the day shone not for a third part of it, and the night likewise.
verses.ct: The 4th angel blew his trumpet, and a 3rd of the sun was struck, along with a 3rd of the moon and a 3rd of the stars. A 3rd of their light went dark, so that a 3rd of the day had no light, and the same was true for the night.

verses.kjv: And I beheld, and heard an angel flying through the midst of heaven, saying with a loud voice, Woe, woe, woe, to the inhabiters of the earth by reason of the other voices of the trumpet of the three angels, which are yet to sound!
verses.ct: Then I looked and heard an angel flying high overhead, crying out in a loud voice, "Disaster! Disaster! Disaster for everyone living on the earth, because of the trumpet blasts that the remaining 3 angels are about to sound!"
